title: Book Museum Tickets
description: A family of four wants to book tickets for the Metropolitan Museum of Art for a specific date.

tasks.description: Check ticket availability for two adults and two children for the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that tickets are available.

tasks.description: Calculate the total cost for the tickets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct total price for the family.

tasks.description: Book the tickets and send the e-tickets to the customer's email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the tickets and provides a confirmation.
